reviewText: All three movies reminded me of the Creature Feature and Chiller days in which i used to see these movies. Gammera is a classic and Night of the Blood Beast is  a chiller. Attack of the Giant Leeches is a classic B movie.

These movies are great if you like oldies but goodies as I do.
It is a triple feature. night of the Blood beast was a bit cheesy.
Other then that wonderful movies.
dont get this studio co. dvd make-(leeches dvd pixelizes aft. time); best movies in order here are: gamera i suppose, leeches & finally... .
